ds_strings_archive.string:
[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8632] / +50%[$12948] / +75%[$15106] / +100%[$17264]
 
Chili: Oh! It's you!
Your fire is more intense than when you got the Trio Badge!

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8632] / +50%[$12948] / +75%[$15106] / +100%[$17264]
 
Cilan: In the Unova region, um, we are still novice Gym Leaders.
Which means, well, that other Gym Leaders are much stronger
than we are. Going...slow...and steady...is OK, so... we compete
with one another and get, um, stronger and stronger.

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8632] / +50%[$12948] / +75%[$15106] / +100%[$17264]
 
Cress: ...We heard about the incident with N's Castle. If we
had received the message in time, the three of us could
have helped.

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8736] / +50%[$13104] / +75%[$15288] / +100%[$17472]
 
Lenora: Oh, it's you! As always, you're raising your Pokémon
with a lot of love! By the way, ol' Clay contacted me recently.
He said you can find Pokémon Fossils in Twist Mountain!
Go check it out if you like!

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8840] / +50%[$13260] / +75%[$15470] / +100%[$17680]
 
Burgh: Heya! This is what I do.
I keep raising Pokémon and drawing pictures inspired by the
Pokémon I raise. It's what I love to do.
My life hums with energy. What could be better?

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$8944] / +50%[$13416] / +75%[$15652] / +100%[$17888]
 
Elesa: I think the real me is the one who battles with Pokémon as
a Gym Leader. A model's job is to make someone else's vision
look like a reality. It's interesting, but it's not easy...

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9048] / +50%[$13572] / +75%[$15834] / +100%[$18096]
 
Clay: Mrrmph! You, huh? Remember what I done told ya? If ya
think ya can go, go wherever, and if ya think ya can do somethin',
keep doin' it. Do things how ya want! Decide yer own limits.

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9152] / +50%[$13728] / +75%[$16016] / +100%[$18304]
 
Skyla: Are you and your Pokémon well? Our battle together was
so much fun. Now, my Pokémon and I have started training again.
I don't usually let people travel in my cargo plane, but battling
with you was such a blast that I'd make an exception.

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9256] / +50%[$13884] / +75%[$16198] / +100%[$18512]
 
Brycen: In the past, when I was hurt and depressed, Alder shared
this with me... There is strength in being with other people and
Pokémon. Receiving their support makes you stronger. The
young man named Cheren also seems to understand this now.

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$9360] / +50%[$14040] / +75%[$16380] / +100%[$18720]
 
You've been on a journey and seen a lot of the world. I'm like
that, too! I'm from way out in the country. I'm really happy that
I've gotten to meet lots of different people and Pokémon!!

Words are engraved on the statue:
“Four great warriors form this Pokémon League.
To the southwest is one who does not fear the Ghost type.
To the southeast is one who channels the power of the
Fighting type. To the northwest is one who has mastered the
Dark type. To the northeast is one who knows the mind of the
Psychic type. If you can defeat these warriors with your
courage and wisdom, you shall be led to the summit,
where the strongest Champion awaits."

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$16560] / +50%[$24840] / +75%[$28980] / +100%[$33120]
 
Cynthia: When you meet Trainers, battle them to learn about the
kind of people they are. Observe the Pokémon they choose, which
moves they taught them, and which items the Pokémon hold.
You don't need words at such times...
If you want to know more about me...
Come to Sinnoh!

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$16560] / +50%[$24840] / +75%[$28980] / +100%[$33120]
 
Cynthia: For some reason, this reminds me of a time when
I told a Trainer like you to go see many, many more places
and to meet many more Pokémon. For me, it has really
been worthwhile to come all the way to far Unova. Why?
Because... I met you, and my world got wider!

[ON COOLDOWN / 18 Hours]
[$15660] / +50%[$23490] / +75%[27405] / +100%[31320]
 
You think about battles very thoroughly.
I lost, but I learned a lot from you.
Besides, it was fun! Come back again tomorrow.

[this message has been deleted by a mod]
Gen 6 When?
WOW, SupersStrings is awesome!

Hey guys, did you know that in terms of human companionship, Flareon is objectively the most huggable Pokemon? While their maximum temperature is likely too much for most, they are capable of controlling it, so they can set themselves to the perfect temperature for you. Along with that, they have a lot of fluff, making them undeniably incredibly soft to touch. But that's not all, they have a very respectable special defense stat of 110, which means that they are likely very calm and resistant to emotional damage. Because of this, if you have a bad day, you can vent to it while hugging it, and it won't mind. It can make itself even more endearing with moves like Charm and Baby Doll Eyes, ensuring that you never have a prolonged bout of depression ever again.
I Masterballed an Alpha
Can someone give me a Pokemon?
